description:
Every single enterprise generate numerical information almost every day. This kind of information is a valuable map as of the enterprise as of the market where the business belongs to, but only less than 20% of it ,is analyzed and use to made decisions.

The most popular software to analyze numerical information is Excel. This software has huge capabilities to transform data in readable information.

If you want to start to learn and use excel in your work or you are already using excel but you donÂ´t use excel formulas to make your job, this course is for you.

At the end of this course you will be able to:

  • Understand the structure of the most important excel formulas used to summarize and analyze information.
  • Make a report using excel formulas and including pie and columns charts on it.
  • Repeat the same report in a short time using the copying procedures, reducing your time on this routines.

This course has been structured in five chapter and 22 lessons, in which there are an explanation of the topic and at least one example will be develop to improve your comprehension of each proposed topic.
title: Excel for Data Analysis
